pages.text: The $(mob)Iron Golem$() is an artificial creature that can be assembled by players or found in $(thing)Villages$(). It targets nearby hostile monsters and attacks them by throwing them in the air, dealing high damage.$(p)$(mob)Iron Golems$() found in $(thing)Villagess$() will retaliate if attacked by a player.
Assembling an $(mob)Iron Golem$(), place the $(item)Pumpkin$() last.
